p: For anatomical investigation by a light microscope, the fresh leaves were fixed with FAA (formalin: acetic acid: 70% ethyl alcohol; 10:5:85) for 24 h, dehydrated in a graded ethanol series, subsequently cleared with xylol, and embedded in paraffin wax at 58 °C. Sections (8–10 μm thick) were stained with hematoxylin and photographed using a Zeiss Axiovert (Carl Zeiss GmbH, Jena, Germany) microscope.
